location.description: Gets or sets the location of the fabric.

tags.description: Gets or sets the resource tags.

location.description: Gets or sets the location of the vault.

tags.description: Gets or sets the resource tags.

clusterName.description: Gets or sets the AzStackHCICluster FQDN name.

resourceName.description: Gets or sets the AzStackHCICluster resource name.

storageAccountName.description: Gets or sets the Storage account name.

storageContainers.description: Gets or sets the list of AzStackHCICluster Storage Container.

azStackHciSiteId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the AzStackHCI site.

migrationSolutionId.description: Gets or sets the Migration solution ARM Id.

machineId.description: Gets or sets the machine Id where Dra is running.

machineName.description: Gets or sets the machine name where Dra is running.

customEmailAddresses.description: Gets or sets the custom email address for sending emails.

locale.description: Gets or sets the locale for the email notification.

sendToOwners.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to send email to subscription administrator.

hyperVSiteId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the HyperV site.

migrationSolutionId.description: Gets or sets the migration solution ARM Id.

HyperVMigrateFabricModelCustomProperties.description: HyperV migrate fabric model custom properties.

diskFileFormat.description: Gets or sets the type of the virtual hard disk, vhd or vhdx.

diskId.description: Gets or sets the disk Id.

diskSizeGB.description: Gets or sets the disk size in GB.

isDynamic.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether dynamic sizing is enabled on the virtual hard
disk.

isOsDisk.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether disk is os disk.

storageContainerId.description: Gets or sets the target storage account ARM Id.

nicId.description: Gets or sets the NIC Id.

selectionTypeForFailover.description: Gets or sets the selection type of the NIC.

targetNetworkId.description: Gets or sets the target network Id within AzStackHCI Cluster.

testNetworkId.description: Gets or sets the target test network Id within AzStackHCI Cluster.

appConsistentFrequencyInMinutes.description: Gets or sets the app consistent snapshot frequency (in minutes).

crashConsistentFrequencyInMinutes.description: Gets or sets the crash consistent snapshot frequency (in minutes).

recoveryPointHistoryInMinutes.description:
Gets or sets the duration in minutes until which the recovery points need to be
stored.

sourceDraName.description: Gets or sets the source DRA name.

Gets or sets the client/application Id of the SPN with which Dra communicates to
service.

tenantId.description: Gets or sets the tenant Id of the SPN with which Dra communicates to service.

minimumMemoryInMegaBytes.description: Gets or sets minimum memory in MB.

targetMemoryBufferPercentage.description: Gets or sets target memory buffer in %.

replicationExtensionName.description: Gets or sets the replication extension name.

vaultType.description: Gets or sets the type of vault.

biosId.description: Gets or sets the BIOS Id of the DRA machine.
